SELECT id, permission_name, permission_desc, url, method, model_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete FROM permission WHERE id = #{id} AND is_delete = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission (permission_name, permission_desc, url, method, module_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete) VALUES (#{permissionName}, #{permissionDesc}, #{url}, #{method}, #{modelId}, NOW(), NOW(), #{isDelete})
mapper.update: UPDATE permission SET permission_name = #{permissionName}, permission_desc = #{permissionDesc}, url = #{url}, method = #{method}, model_id = #{modelId}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE permission SET is_delete = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
